plot: The poignant story of Trista, a young girl forced to take care of her dying mother, and what happens the day she finally returns to school.
title: Blanco
plot_es: The poignant story of Trista, a young girl forced to take care of her dying mother, and what happens the day she finally returns to school.
plot_en: The poignant story of Trista, a young girl forced to take care of her dying mother, and what happens the day she finally returns to school.
